overview: This Daring! adventure takes you undercover into the late night club scene where the music is throbbing all night long, and women allow their primal urges to take over on the dance floor. Everyone is hunting for a 'dance' partner to indulge their fantasies and make the music come alive with real passion and lust. Let yourself be carried away by the pulsating music and let your carnal impulses move your body to new heights of ecstasy!
title: Trippin'
